full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAG YIG GCES BSDUS 'KHRUL SPONG LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I SKYA RENGS GSAR BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B CES DAG YIG GCES BSDUS 'KHRUL SPONG LEGS BSHAD SKYA RENGS GSAR BA ZHES PA 'DI NI SNGA MO NAS BSGRIGS 'DU YOD THOG ,'GAS KYANG BSKUL MA BYED PA LTAR LHA LDAN GRVA SKOR BA'I ING CAN AA LAG SHA'I SA MTHAR SKYES PA'I GYI NA BA NGAG DBANG BSTAN DAR GYIS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE YUN RING DU RGYAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,,ZHES PA 'DI NI SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O,, ,,
author_simple: AA LAG SHA PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN DAR,
